```{r}
library(shiny)
library(bslib)
library(readxl)

badge <- function(x,color){
  class <- paste0("badge bg-transparent border border-",color," text-",color," fw-normal")
  badge <-  tags$span(class=class,x)
  return(badge)
}

# bibliography loading
bibliography <- read_excel("data/bibliography.xlsx")

# compilation of bibliography
list_biblio <- function(i) {
  bibliography_year  <- bibliography[bibliography$year == i,]
  html_bib <- lapply( 1:dim(bibliography_year)[1], function(j) {
    div(class="list-group-item text-dark text-start",
        tags$span(
          #class="text-dark fs-6",
          bibliography_year$title[j]
        ),
        tags$span(
          class="text-primary",
          bibliography_year$journal[j]
        ),
        div(
          class="d-flex justify-content-between mt-1 mb-2",
          div(
            badge(bibliography_year$author_place[j],"dark"),
            tags$a(
              href=bibliography_year$url[j],
              role="button",
              class="badge bg-transparent border border-dark text-dark fw-normal",
              icon("globe")
            )
          ),
          div(
            if (bibliography_year$tag_infectious[j]==1){badge(fontawesome::fa("virus"),"dark")},
            if (bibliography_year$tag_child[j]==1){badge(fontawesome::fa("child"),"dark")},
            if (bibliography_year$tag_women[j]==1){badge(fontawesome::fa("female"),"dark")},
            if (bibliography_year$tag_method[j]==1){badge(fontawesome::fa("wrench"),"dark")}
          )
        )
    )
  })
  
  return(tagList(html_bib))
}
```
